Author: rail
Name: AetherDraw
Description: A realtime multi-user whiteboard raid planner plugin to draw encounter strategies. Supports url imports
Punchline: A realtime multi-user whiteboard raid planner. Compatible with https://aetherdraw.me
Changelog:
v2.4.4.2: API 14, 7.4
v2.4.4.1: wrong version of lock canvas+undo bug
v2.4.4.0: Added Gaze, Towers, Starburst, and Exas mechanic icons. Added Laser Pointer tool (ephemeral). Added 'Lock All Items' canvas toggle.
v2.4.3.1:Serialization fix.
v2.4.3.0: Added Pie/Wedge shape tool. Added Caster role icon. Added Job icon swapping in Properties window. Added new Bind/Ignore target markers. Updated Party icon menu layout.
v2.4.2.0: Overhauled Load/Import window with tabs. Added ability to 'Append' plans (merge pages) from files or URLs. Replaced old Load popup.
v2.4.1.0: Added Community Plan Browser (Search & Load).
